English.Text: Not as stealthy as you had imagined. As you stalk around to the promenade behind the casino, you are hit by a warm riviera breeze and the sight of exotic palms. You scale the wall without incident, but then accidently trip through a skylight. You crunch onto the rug of a guest bedroom in a rain of shattered crystal. Luckily the guest is downstairs playing craps and will not discover this mess until much later. Trying to summon whatever remaining grace you have, you make your way inside the casino and debate your best bet for finding the Queen.
